General.Name: finnCap Group PLC
General.Description: finnCap Group plc provides various financial services to growth companies in the United Kingdom. The company offers equities research, distribution and execution, and analytics services. It also provides investment banking services, such as strategic advisory and capital raising services comprising public market fund raisings, including placings, rights issues, and open offers; IPOs; sell-side or buy-side private M&A; public company M&A; debt arrangement and advice; private capital fund raisings; and general advice on strategic options, as well as acts as a corporate broker/NOMAD on a retained basis. The company serves listed and private companies, private equity and hedge funds, institutional investors, family offices, investment trusts, and private client fund managers. It serves various sectors, which include technology, consumer, life sciences, support services, industrial technology, energy, mining, and financials. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 1 Bartholomew Close, London, United Kingdom, EC1A 7BL
